import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Login = ({ history }) => { const [loginData, setLoginData] = useState({}); const handleBlur = (e) => { const newLoginData = { ...loginData }; newLoginData[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setLoginData(newLoginData); }; const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); history.push("/"); }; return (
